backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining state maps, company and review types, official profile and response structures, and integrating access control, blob storage, Stripe, and user approval modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence descriptor listing a landing page text change, affected file, related components, and test metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing multiple frontend files and their functionality across the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, SEO tags, favicon, canonical URL, and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application container handling routing, authentication, user role logic, official profile flow, and global UI components.
Scroll-triggered floating button that smoothly scrolls the page back to the top.
frontend/src/components/CompanyCreationM: Modal for creating companies with category and city lists, validation, and backend submission via React Query.
Form component for editing company data, using sector and city lists and submitting edits via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/CompanyEditHisto: Displays a compact or full list of company edit history entries with preview buttons and a details modal.
Renders a chronological timeline of company edits with expandable details and modal-based change previews.
frontend/src/components/EditDetailsModal: Modal showing detailed information about a specific company edit, including changed fields and metadata.
frontend/src/components/EvidenceModal.ts: Modal viewer for evidence files supporting PDFs, images, audio, and video with download and open-in-new-tab options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button managing Internet Identity login/logout flow and clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/MobileMenu.tsx: Mobile navigation menu showing links and a role-based CTA button depending on authentication and employer request status.
frontend/src/components/MultipleEvidence: Modal for browsing multiple evidence files with file-type detection, navigation, and download support.
frontend/src/components/OfficialProfileR: Modal allowing users to submit an official profile request with company lookup, file upload, validation, and suggestions.
frontend/src/components/OfficialResponse: Timeline displaying sorted edit history for official responses with a modal to view detailed changes.
Form modal for creating or editing an official response with text, file uploads, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Component showing the authenticated user's official profile request status with messages for pending, approved, or rejected states.
frontend/src/components/RatingDisplay.ts: Displays a star-based rating with optional label, numeric value, and review count.
frontend/src/components/RatingInput.tsx: Provides interactive star rating input with label, required marker, and optional hint.
frontend/src/components/RejectionNotific: Shows a dismissible rejection alert with expandable details and a button to view the rejection reason.
frontend/src/components/RejectionReasonM: Modal presenting the rejection reason text with close controls.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSubmission: Modal for submitting a company review with ratings, text, file uploads, and validation.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionModa: Modal displaying subscription plan details, pricing, and a placeholder payment flow.
Dialog for submitting platform improvement suggestions with validation and success state.
frontend/src/config/subscriptionPlans.ts: Defines subscription plan configurations and helpers for retrieving and formatting plans.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvidenceArchiveDow: Provides a hook for triggering multi-file ZIP downloads and a helper to return placeholder resolved file URL data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines Internet Identity auth context, handles login, stored identity loading, and exposes identity state through a provider and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfObjectUrl.ts: Fetches a remote PDF as a blob, returns an object URL for inline viewing, and manages loading and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements react-query hooks for backend actor calls, including user context, admin checks, companies, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme variables, typography, transitions, and custom UI utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for reviewing official profile requests with document previews, PDF handling, and request approval or rejection.
Admin page that lists suggestions, filters them, shows details, and allows status updates with validation.
frontend/src/pages/BlockchainPage.tsx: Static informational page explaining how Verithos uses blockchain and related concepts.
frontend/src/pages/CompanyPage.tsx: Displays company details, reviews, evidence, statistics, and allows editing, reporting, supporting, and viewing histories.
frontend/src/pages/EmployersPage.tsx: Lists companies with filtering, sorting, statistics, and admin creation/editing tools.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, manifesto, and navigation to employers; includes scroll-reset logic.
frontend/src/pages/MyOfficialProfilePage: Dashboard page showing a company's official profile, metrics, reviews, responses, subscription status, and management actions using multiple data-fetching hooks.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with actions to retry or return to the landing page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a successful payment confirmation with navigation options back to the user's profile or home.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the platform’s privacy policy with explanations of data handling, anonymity, and blockchain storage.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays the platform’s terms of use, outlining rules, responsibilities, and content restrictions.
frontend/src/utils/cityData.ts: Exports a large list of Bulgarian city names for use in forms or selection components.
frontend/src/utils/evidenceArchiveDownlo: Provides a utility to fetch files via resolved URLs and bundle them into a ZIP archive using JSZip, reporting successes and failures.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides helpers for formatting dates, file sizes, blockchain hashes, URLs, and determining file types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both standard and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains validation logic for file sizes, file types, rating ranges, and company form data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, content paths, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, versioning, and tracked feature requests for the Verithos project.
